Key Match Events: Trae Young's instrumental play in the fourth quarter helped Atlanta put away New York
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was the continuation of a rivalry between Young and the Knicks dating back to the 2021 NBA playoffs
Others: Trae Young's dismissive farewell toward the exiting Knicks fans
The Knicks' fourth loss of the season despite six players scoring in double-figures
Mikal Bridges and All-Star Jalen Brunson underperformed
The Knicks will look to win against the Milwaukee Bucks on Friday and get back at Young when they next face the Hawks on Jan 20
